alert.note: Alert for Yuma County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 2:00PM MDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...Brief Landspout Tornadoes Possible... At 159 PM MDT, conditions are becoming favorable for the development of landspout tornadoes in and close to the western and central portions of Yuma and Kit Carson Counties in Colorado. However, at this time it is unknown which if any storm would produce a landspout. Any tornadoes which develop are expected to pose a limited threat. Locations impacted include... Yuma, Wray, Flagler, Seibert, Eckley, Vona and Abarr. Landspout tornadoes can form with a developing thunderstorm before rain, hail, and even thunder is observed. Landspout tornadoes are not usually associated with a wall cloud and are often difficult to detect with weather radar. &&
